channel.title: [317] Asgarnia - Flawless Content | Highly Enjoyable Content
channel.description:
[CENTER][size=18pt]Asgarnia[/size]
Welcome to Asgarnia. We are a community with an aim of restoring the land of Glienor; the amazing content in our game is sure to entertain any Nostalgic player who longs to re-live the 'golden age'. Our development team focuses on the finest details to provide a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience. Our game will also feature new and unique content that will be found exclusively on Asgarnia.
Asgarnia is a community based server. This means our development team focuses on bringing all of the communities most demanded features to life as soon as possible. Our website and game will revolve around our community base and what makes the community as a whole content and enjoying our game to the fullest.
What you see and read about below is exactly what you will experience when you log in to play Asgarnia; even the smallest of details have been incorporated into our game to provide the same look and feel from the era that we feel was the peak of Rs2 Emulation.
[/CENTER]
[center][img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/content_zps0b0534ad.png[/img]
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/skills_zps2debe9c2.png[/img] [/center]
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/woodcutting_zpsd9cc1c83.png[/img] - You must have the required level to use your axe. - You must have the required level to chop the tree. - You must have an axe to chop down a tree. - The higher your woodcutting level is, the faster the chopping rate is. - The better your axe is, the faster the chopping rate. - If you have multiple axe's in your inventory or equipment, it will choose the best one based on your woodcutting level. - If your inventory is full, you cannot start an event, this will also cancel the event. - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/mining_zps14e372b9.png[/img] - You must be holding a Pickaxe of which you have the requirement for, whether it be in your inventory or equipment. - You will mine with the best available Pickaxe you are holding. - You cannot mine if you have a full inventory. This will cancel also any current mining event if one exists. - All rocks across the game world have been configured and will work, guaranteed. - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/herblore_zpsb57ef8d7.png[/img] - You may now clean all grimy herb types. - You are able to mix all clean herb's with a vial of water to produce an unfinished potion. - You are able to mix all additive ingredients to the unfinished mixtures to produce a magical potion. - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct. - All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, 'x', all).
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/fletching_zps62da7aee.png[/img]
- You may now create headless and complete arrows using arrow shafts + feathers > headless arrows + arrow tips. - You may now fletch log's into headless arrows, unstrung bow's, and crossbow stock's. - You may now string all unstrung bow's into a complete bow. - All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, 'x', all) - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/fishing_zps5ac357fd.png[/img] - Fishing may be trained across the map at all different fishing spots. - Players receive fish at a faster rate as your Fishing level increases. - Players receive random fishing according to the fishing equipment and spot you are fishing with. - Players receive the correct experience, and must have the required level, bait and fishing equipment.
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/crafting_zps3b2c2369.png[/img] [b]Gem Cutting[/b] - You may cut all types of gems, including specialty gems from Shilo Village. - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct. - All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, 'x', all)
[b]Wheel Spinning[/b] - All raw materials may be spun on the spinning wheel. - All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct. - All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, 'x', all)
[b]Leather Armor Creation[/b] - Correct leather creation with make 1, 5 and 10 options - All leather armor can be created with a needle and thread - Correct level requirements, consumption requirements and experience gains.
[b]Dragon Hide Armor Creation[/b] - All Dragonhide types may be crafted into d'hide armour. - All level requirements and experience gains are 100% correct.
[b]Hide Tanning[/b] - ​All hides may be tanned to leather. - Tanner's may be found at all of the proper locations. - All hides have the level requirement and costs.
[b]Glass Melting[/b] - Seeweed may be used on a fire or a range to turn it to Soda ash. - While carrying bucket of sand and soda ash, the player may use one of the items on a furnace to produce molten glass.
[b]Glass Blowing[/b] [color=limegreen] - While carrying a Glassblowing pipe, players may blow molten glass into all types of glass items. - All material requirements, experience gains, and rewards are 100% correct.[/COLOR]
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/thieving_zps790c45a9.png[/img] [b]Pickpocketing[/b] [color=limegreen] - All Npc's vulnerable to pickpocketing have been configured properly. - As your thieving level is increased, your pickpocketing success rate will also be more consistent. - You can not pickpocket while you are stunned. - You can not walk while you are stunned. - You can not pickpocket during combat. - You can not pickpocket if your opponent is instigating an attack (prior to stunning). - You can not pickpocket if the victim is in combat with another player. - You can not pickpocket while doing another form of action or skill.[/COLOR]
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/combat_zpsa18a88f4.png[/img] [b]Melee[/b] - Extremely accurate maxhit formula corresponding to RuneScape. - Very accurate blocking/attacking delays - All special attacks on near perfect delays. - Equipment bonus's & affects. (Barrows, Void Armor Ring of Life, Ring of Recoil, Berserker, etc.) - Proper animations for all weapons. - Player poisoning which can be healed by a potion or a period of time. [b] Magic[/b] - Perfect Defensive Autocasting. - Perfect Modern spell magics with Autocasting - Perfect Ancient spell magics with Autocasting - Correct RuneScape Teleportation. [Requires runes] - All Miscellaneous spells (Telekinetic grab, confuse, weaken) - Perfect Teleblock, prayer will reduce time blocked.
[b]Range[/b] [color=limegreen] - Clipped Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe's) - Clipped long range following. - All bows with correct bonuses and special attacks. - All crossbows with correct bolt special effects, including Karil's c-bow. - Perfect Dark bow "Decent of Dragons" special attack max-hit formula. + Both attacks will [B][I][U]ALWAYS[/U][/I][/B] hit. + If using [B]normal arrow types[/B], the minimum hit will be[B] 5[/B]. + However, using [B]Dragon Arrows[/B], then the minimum hit will be [B]8[/B]. + If opponent is praying against [B]ranged combat styles[/B], then the minimum hit will be with [B]normal arrows[/B]: [B]3[/B], and with[B] dragon arrows[/B]: [B]4[/B]. + Using [B]normal arrows[/B], your max hit will be boosted by [B]30%[/B]. + Using [B]dragon arrows[/B], your max hit will be boosted by [B]50%[/B].[/COLOR]
[center][img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/Miscellaneous_zps456de107.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/random_zps4bf05144.png[/img] [color=limegreen]- Region based music - Weapon, spell, and other miscellaneous sounds. - Custom (yet not overdone) settings interface with screenshot function. - Consumables (Food & Potions) of all types may be consumed with the proper result. - OpenRS Update Server[/COLOR] - Python (Jython) scripting engine handles nearly all interactive content such as as the following: + Npc Interactions. + Item Interactions. + Object Interactions. + Item Operations. + Actionbuttons. + Commands. [b] Toys[/b] - Toy Horsey
- Crate Searching. - Clipped following. (with old-school 'dancing') - Very efficient container system. (Inventory, Trade, Bank..) - Incredibly fast and flawless item switching system. [must see youtube] - Dupe-proof Trading. - Banking. - Bank Pins. - Crystal Key Chest. - Welcome Screen with integrated account information. - All Emotes including Skillcape emotes. - Explosive Potions. - Cow Milking. - Teleport Tabs. - Teleport Other spell "teleother". - Our very own Questing system which takes advantage of Polymorphism. - Graham's Harvesting, Action & Production Action systems improved and implemented and for skilling.
[center] [img]http://i1059.photobucket.com/albums/t426/helloman449/media_zpsc3e576a3.png[/img] [i][b]NOTE:[/b] Some images may say Kalegrian on the frame this is because it is Asgarnia's former name.[/i]
[b]Fishing[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/5Xwo8y6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KeHbLdC.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cK4g20R.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/L2J4zkv.png[/img]
[b]Fletching[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/W4ndJXu.png[/img]
[b]More images soon. If you want more information on the server please don't be threatened to ask.[/b]
[/center]

item.title: [317] Asgarnia - Flawless Content | Highly Enjoyable Content
item.dc:creator: @AsgarniaRSPS AsgarniaRSPS
item.description:
@AsgarniaRSPS wrote:

[CENTER][size=18pt]Asgarnia[/size]

Welcome to Asgarnia. We are a community with an aim of restoring the land of Glienor; the amazing content in our game is sure to entertain any Nostalgic player who longs to re-live the ‘golden age’. Our development team focuses on the finest details to provide a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience. Our game will also feature new and unique content that will be found exclusively on Asgarnia.

Asgarnia is a community based server. This means our development team focuses on bringing all of the communities most demanded features to life as soon as possible. Our website and game will revolve around our community base and what makes the community as a whole content and enjoying our game to the fullest.

What you see and read about below is exactly what you will experience when you log in to play Asgarnia; even the smallest of details have been incorporated into our game to provide the same look and feel from the era that we feel was the peak of Rs2 Emulation.

[/CENTER]

[center]


[/center]

  • You must have the required level to use your axe.
  • You must have the required level to chop the tree.
  • You must have an axe to chop down a tree.
  • The higher your woodcutting level is, the faster the chopping rate is.
  • The better your axe is, the faster the chopping rate.
  • If you have multiple axe’s in your inventory or equipment, it will choose the best one based on your woodcutting level.
  • If your inventory is full, you cannot start an event, this will also cancel the event.
  • All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.

  • You must be holding a Pickaxe of which you have the requirement for, whether it be in your inventory or equipment.
  • You will mine with the best available Pickaxe you are holding.
  • You cannot mine if you have a full inventory. This will cancel also any current mining event if one exists.
  • All rocks across the game world have been configured and will work, guaranteed.
  • All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.

  • You may now clean all grimy herb types.
  • You are able to mix all clean herb’s with a vial of water to produce an unfinished potion.
  • You are able to mix all additive ingredients to the unfinished mixtures to produce a magical potion.
  • All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
  • All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, ‘x’, all).

  • You may now create headless and complete arrows using arrow shafts + feathers > headless arrows + arrow tips.
  • You may now fletch log’s into headless arrows, unstrung bow’s, and crossbow stock’s.
  • You may now string all unstrung bow’s into a complete bow.
  • All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, ‘x’, all)
  • All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.

  • Fishing may be trained across the map at all different fishing spots.
  • Players receive fish at a faster rate as your Fishing level increases.
  • Players receive random fishing according to the fishing equipment and spot you are fishing with.
  • Players receive the correct experience, and must have the required level, bait and fishing equipment.


Gem Cutting
- You may cut all types of gems, including specialty gems from Shilo Village.
- All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
- All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, ‘x’, all)

Wheel Spinning
- All raw materials may be spun on the spinning wheel.
- All animations, level requirements, experience and gain rates as well as rewards are 100% correct.
- All interface options configured correctly (Make 5, 10, ‘x’, all)

Leather Armor Creation
- Correct leather creation with make 1, 5 and 10 options
- All leather armor can be created with a needle and thread
- Correct level requirements, consumption requirements and experience gains.

Dragon Hide Armor Creation
- All Dragonhide types may be crafted into d’hide armour.
- All level requirements and experience gains are 100% correct.

Hide Tanning
- ​All hides may be tanned to leather.
- Tanner’s may be found at all of the proper locations.
- All hides have the level requirement and costs.

Glass Melting
- Seeweed may be used on a fire or a range to turn it to Soda ash.
- While carrying bucket of sand and soda ash, the player may use one of the items on a furnace to produce molten glass.

Glass Blowing
[color=limegreen] - While carrying a Glassblowing pipe, players may blow molten glass into all types of glass items.
- All material requirements, experience gains, and rewards are 100% correct.[/COLOR]


Pickpocketing
[color=limegreen] - All Npc’s vulnerable to pickpocketing have been configured properly.

  • As your thieving level is increased, your pickpocketing success rate will also be more consistent.
  • You can not pickpocket while you are stunned.
  • You can not walk while you are stunned.
  • You can not pickpocket during combat.
  • You can not pickpocket if your opponent is instigating an attack (prior to stunning).
  • You can not pickpocket if the victim is in combat with another player.
  • You can not pickpocket while doing another form of action or skill.[/COLOR]


Melee

  • Extremely accurate maxhit formula corresponding to RuneScape.
  • Very accurate blocking/attacking delays
  • All special attacks on near perfect delays.
  • Equipment bonus’s & affects. (Barrows, Void Armor Ring of Life, Ring of Recoil, Berserker, etc.)
  • Proper animations for all weapons.
  • Player poisoning which can be healed by a potion or a period of time.

    Magic
  • Perfect Defensive Autocasting.
  • Perfect Modern spell magics with Autocasting
  • Perfect Ancient spell magics with Autocasting
  • Correct RuneScape Teleportation. [Requires runes]
  • All Miscellaneous spells (Telekinetic grab, confuse, weaken)
  • Perfect Teleblock, prayer will reduce time blocked.

Range
[color=limegreen] - Clipped Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe’s)

  • Clipped long range following.
  • All bows with correct bonuses and special attacks.
  • All crossbows with correct bolt special effects, including Karil’s c-bow.
  • Perfect Dark bow “Decent of Dragons” special attack max-hit formula.
    • Both attacks will ALWAYS hit.
    • If using normal arrow types, the minimum hit will be 5.
    • However, using Dragon Arrows, then the minimum hit will be 8.
    • If opponent is praying against ranged combat styles, then the minimum hit will be with normal arrows: 3, and with dragon arrows: 4.
    • Using normal arrows, your max hit will be boosted by 30%.
    • Using dragon arrows, your max hit will be boosted by 50%.[/COLOR]

[center][/center]


[color=limegreen]- Region based music

  • Weapon, spell, and other miscellaneous sounds.

  • Custom (yet not overdone) settings interface with screenshot function.

  • Consumables (Food & Potions) of all types may be consumed with the proper result.

  • OpenRS Update Server[/COLOR]

  • Python (Jython) scripting engine handles nearly all interactive content such as as the following:

    • Npc Interactions.
    • Item Interactions.
    • Object Interactions.
    • Item Operations.
    • Actionbuttons.
    • Commands.

      Toys
    • Toy Horsey

  • Crate Searching.

  • Clipped following. (with old-school ‘dancing’)

  • Very efficient container system. (Inventory, Trade, Bank…)

  • Incredibly fast and flawless item switching system. [must see youtube]

  • Dupe-proof Trading.

  • Banking.

  • Bank Pins.

  • Crystal Key Chest.

  • Welcome Screen with integrated account information.

  • All Emotes including Skillcape emotes.

  • Explosive Potions.

  • Cow Milking.

  • Teleport Tabs.

  • Teleport Other spell “teleother”.

  • Our very own Questing system which takes advantage of Polymorphism.

  • Graham’s Harvesting, Action & Production Action systems improved and implemented and for skilling.

[center]

NOTE: Some images may say Kalegrian on the frame this is because it is Asgarnia’s former name.

Fishing

5Xwo8y6.png769×548

KeHbLdC.png771×549

cK4g20R.png771×549

L2J4zkv.png771×549

Fletching

W4ndJXu.png771×551

More images soon.
If you want more information on the server please don’t be threatened to ask.

[/center]

Read full topic
